title: [LIMITED SALE] 1000AC Exchange Ticket
description:
Limited time offer! Get 1,000 ARKS Cash (AC) in-game currency
- 1 time only
- Discount may not be exactly 43% depending on your currency
- Limited time only
- After purchasing, collect your 1,000 AC by logging in to PSO2 New Genesis
longDescription:
Limited time offer!
Get 1,000 ARKS Cash (AC) in-game currency.

- Purchasable 1 time only. 

- Discount may not be exactly 43%, depending on your country's currency.

- Available for a limited time only. Not be available once the purchase period ends.

- After purchasing, collect your 1,000 AC by logging in to Phantasy Star Online 2 New Genesis.
You will not receive the exchange ticket as an in-game item. The AC will automatically be credited to you after logging in, so be sure to check the Log Window.

- AC can be used to purchase items at the AC Shop, as well as AC Scratch Tickets.

- AC is an in-game currency for Phantasy Star Online 2 New Genesis.
It cannot be used for other services or services within Japan.

- This offer requires Phantasy Star Online 2 New Genesis.
If you are prompted to install the latest patch, please update your software before using.

- If this is your first purchase, it may take up to 24 hours for it to be reflected within the game.
If over 48 hours have passed and the purchase still has not been reflected, please contact us through the Phantasy Star Online 2 New Genesis Official Website.

- Please note that AC redeemed with this voucher cannot be used for the PS4 version.
